name: SlashHeroku
description: Run the heroku toolbelt from Slack.

APP_NAME.description: The application name used by the coal_car gem for identifying this app

FERNET_SECRET.description: The secret used for writing encrypted values to the database. Generate with 'dd if=/dev/urandom bs=32 count=1 2>/dev/null | openssl base64'.

GITHUB_ADMIN_LOGINS.description: A comma delimited list of GitHub logins that can access sidekiq-web

GITHUB_OAUTH_ID.description: The GitHub OAuth client id for being an OAuth consumer

GITHUB_OAUTH_SECRET.description: The GitHub OAuth client secret for being an OAuth consumer

HEROKU_OAUTH_ID.description: The Heroku OAuth client id for being an OAuth consumer

HEROKU_OAUTH_SECRET.description: The Heroku OAuth client secret for being an OAuth consumer

HOSTNAME.description: The full hostname that the application is running at.

LIBRATO_PASSWORD.description: The password for your librato integration.

LIBRATO_SOURCE.description: The source prefix for your librato integration.

LIBRATO_TOKEN.description: The token for your librato integration.

LIBRATO_USER.description: The user email for your librato integration.

PRIVACY_POLICY_URL.description: The url of your privacy policy.

RAILS_ENV.description: This is what the RAILS_ENV unix environmental variable is set to.

RAILS_SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: Unique token for signing cookies. This is generated.

RBNACL_SECRET.description: The secret used for writing encrypted values to the database. Generate with 'dd if=/dev/urandom bs=32 count=1 2>/dev/null | openssl base64'.

REDIS_URL.description: The URL for the Heroku Redis install that sidekiq uses. Leave this alone.

ROLLBAR_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The token for your rollbar project.

SLACK_APP_URL.description: The direct link to your app in the Slack App Store

SLACK_OAUTH_ID.description: The Slack OAuth client id for being an OAuth consumer

SLACK_OAUTH_SECRET.description: The Slack OAuth client secret for being an OAuth consumer

SLACK_SLASH_COMMAND_TOKEN.description: The token from slack to ensure it's a valid incoming request

YUBIEXPIRE_HOSTNAME.description: The hostname to post keys to to ensure everything gets invalidated at some point.

KOLKRABBI_HOSTNAME.description: The hostname for Heroku's kolkrabbi service. Leave this alone.
